00001 def evenfront(pop, rand, size):
00002     newpop = pop[:]
00003     newpop.sort(lambda a,b: cmp(a.rank, b.rank))
00004 
00005     fronts = []
00006     ranks = []
00007     for ind in newpop:
00008         if ind.rank in ranks:
00009             fronts[ranks.index(ind.rank)].append(ind)
00010         else:
00011             ranks.append(ind.rank)
00012             fronts.append([ind])
00013 
00014     subset = []
00015     front_len = len(fronts)
00016     front_index = [0] * front_len
00017 
00018     i = 0
00019     while len(subset) < size:
00020         if front_index[i] < len(fronts[i]):
00021             toinsert = min(3, len(fronts[i]))
00022             subset.extend(fronts[i][front_index[i] : front_index[i]+toinsert])
00023             front_index[i] += toinsert
00024         i = (i+1) % front_len
00025 
00026     newindex = [pop.index(ind) for ind in subset]
00027 
00028     #for ind in subset:
00029     #    print 'ind rank ', ind.rank
00030     return subset[:size], newindex
